title: Are girls calculating?
creator_credit: Diane O'Connor and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: This videotape can be used not only in the maths-science classroom to encourage girls to see the importance of maths, but also as a valuable resource for careers teachers, and for social science units on either the workforce or sexism in society.
